newsitem.title: UK: NWE gasoline steady to touch firmer, but slow.
newsitem.headline: NWE gasoline steady to touch firmer, but slow.

text.p: NWE Latest physical gasoline prices were steady to a touch firmer, but activity was essentially restricted to talk rather than trade.
Traders said barges of eurograde Rotterdam refinery material was pegged around $188-189, but that bid and offer levels were wide apart.
"I've heard bids of $188 and offers of $192 - buyers are reluctant to come up and sellers not keen on coming down,"
Cargoes were also quiet, and assessed about $4 off barge levels.
